page.title: 12BRIGHTLEY MILL
page.content: {Brightley Mill}is now a factory that makes kites and other toys. Most of the people go to work there by motorbikes and cars. The man that owns{Brookite}is called Mr Harrison. At the mill three men and about eight women work. There are four rooms with different machines in them. There is a machine that makes moulds for the toys. At the mill there are lots of sewing machines and they use them to sew the kites and hobbyhorses. They make about a hundred{kites}a day and there are ten different kinds of kites. They also make hobby horses, wigwams, beach bags, bean bags, and dog and cats beds. The factory used to be near London but they moved down to{Devon}because the owners wanted to live in the country.
